Package fj.control.db

Abstractions for JDBC connections.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Connector A method of connecting to the database.
DB<A> The DB monad represents a database action, or a value within the context of a database connection.
DbState Performs database I/O, in order to read or write the database state.
 

Package fj.control.db Description

Abstractions for JDBC connections.
